text: Martin John Christopher Freeman (born 8 September 1971) is an English actor. His most famous roles include Tim Canterbury in The Office, John in Love Actually, Arthur Dent in the film adaptation of The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, Dr. Watson in Sherlock, and Paul Maddens in Nativity! He played the role of Bilbo Baggins in Peter Jackson's three-part adaptation of The Hobbit. ==Early life== Freeman was born in Aldershot, Hampshire. He went to Salesian School. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Hampshire Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
title: Martin Freeman
